I have tried running Heritrix 1.10.2 on a server with a firewall and
encoun=
tered errors when I tried running it. Both the GUIPORT and the
JMXPORT are =
already open in the firewall but the error persist. The
only way Heritrix w=
ould run successfully was when the firewall is
disabled. 

[root@CRAWLER bi=
n]# netstat -auntp | grep 14739
tcp        0      0 :::40325               =
     :::*

tcp        0      0=
 ::ffff:172.30.9.208:8080    :::*

java

=

       :::*

 0 ::ffff:172.30.9.208:8080    :::*

3/java

When I checked the netstat of Heritrix, I =
found out that it was using
3 ports and the 3rd port was random. What is th=
e 3rd port used for and
is there any way to specify it so that I can open a=
 port in the firewall?
